subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods shot a 65, moving into a tie for the lead with Charlie Wi in the Arnold Palmer Invitational, while Graeme McDowell was one shot back after a 63 at Bay Hill.
snippet: Tiger Woods shot a 65, moving into a tie for the lead with Charlie Wi in the Arnold Palmer Invitational, while Graeme McDowell was one shot back after a 63 at Bay Hill.
